//check if block info is installed and active

subNode:value.scalar:string: as id_module, MAX(hm.position)+1 as position FROM `
hook` h on hm.id_hook=h.id_hook WHERE h.name = "

cms_block`( `id_cms_block` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `id_cms_category` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `location` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `position` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `display_store` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '1', PRIMARY KEY (`id_cms_block`) ) ENGINE=
cms_block_lang`( `id_cms_block` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `id_lang` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `name` varchar(40) NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY (`id_cms_block`, `id_lang`) ) ENGINE=

cms_block_page`( `id_cms_block_page` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `id_cms_block` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `id_cms` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `is_category` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_cms_block_page`) ) ENGINE=
